import React, { use } from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useAuth0 } from "@auth0/auth0-react"; export default function Loan (){ const { user, isAuthenticated, loginWithRedirect } = useAuth0(); useEffect(() =>{ window.scrollTo(0,0); if(!isAuthenticated){ loginWithRedirect(); } }, []); const [ loanName , useLoanName ] = useState(""); const [ lender, useLender ] = useState(""); const [ amount, useAmount ] = useState(0); const [ panNum, usePanNum ] = useState(""); const [ date, useDate ] = useState(null); const name = user.name; const email = user.email; const handleChange = async(event) => { event.preventDefault(); try{ const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/loan', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({loanName, lender, amount, panNum, date, name, email}) }); if (response.ok) { alert('Message sent!'); } else { alert('Failed to send message'); } } catch (err) { console.error('Error:', err); alert('Error occurred'); } } return (

Credit Score Simulator

This tool is a simplified simulator to help you understand the major factors that contribute to a business credit score. Input your data and see a simulated score and what it means.

Note: This is not a real credit score calculation and should be used for educational purposes only.

Percentage of on-time payments (e.g., 95 for 95%).

Percentage of available credit used (ideally below 30%).

The age of your oldest credit account in years.

Number of times you have recently applied for new credit.

Simulated Credit Score:

My Loan Statements

Keep all your loan information in one place. Add new loans to your list to easily track and manage your financial obligations.

useLender(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded w-5/6 pl-3 pr-10 py-2 focus:outline-none" placeholder="e.g., State Bank of India" />
useAmount(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded w-5/6 pl-3 pr-10 py-2 focus:outline-none" placeholder="e.g., 500000" />
usePanNum(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded w-5/6 pl-3 pr-10 py-2 focus:outline-none" placeholder="e.g., ABCDE1234F" />
useDate(e.target.value)} className="border border-gray-300 rounded w-5/6 pl-3 pr-10 py-2 focus:outline-none" />

Affordable Loan Finder

Explore these government schemes and trusted organizations that provide loans with affordable interest rates for MSMEs.

Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)

Provides loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro-enterprises. The scheme has three categories: Shishu (up to ₹50k), Kishore (₹50k-₹5 lakh), and Tarun (₹5 lakh-₹10 lakh).

Official Website →

Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro & Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)

Offers collateral-free loans up to ₹2 crore. It provides a guarantee cover to the lending institutions, making it easier for MSMEs to secure funding without third-party guarantees.

Official Website →

SIDBI (Small Industries Development Bank of India)

A major financial institution dedicated to MSME development. SIDBI offers a wide range of loans for modernization, expansion, and working capital under various schemes.

Official Website →
